JobFullDesc:
uShip is seeking a talented DATA ANALYST II  to join our Strategy, Reporting, & Analytics (SRA) team. This individual will work in cross-functional teams to build out reporting datasets for self-service applications, mine data for insights, and create dashboards for visibility.   If you are a supremely motivated, smart, and driven individual who wants to work in a fast-paced, ever changing start-up environment, this is the position for you!  The ideal candidate will be data-driven, intellectually curious, and a clear communicator.

YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES


Use relevant information to uncover meaningful behavioral insights.
Perform deep dive analysis to help guide product initiatives.
Work cross functionally with our internal analytics & finance teams to test theories and develop new ways to analyze data.
Discover, analyze and quantify trends and correlations
Create reports for management as needed
Make strategic recommendations backed up by quantifiable data
Track, monitor, and report on new initiatives
Create products based on corporate needs as justified by quantifiable data
Design dashboards and data visualizations to communicate meaningful metrics for our Marketing team.
Deliver sophisticated analyses to senior leadership that bring thoughtful evaluation of data.
Find opportunities for improvement in reporting; modify existing tools, techniques, or processes to improve our data interruption.

REQUIREMENTS


Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field or equivalent experience.
Experience with quantitative analysis
Experience working within eCommerce
Solid understanding of databases and data mining
Some SQL experience recommended
Ability to research and find resolution to technical data/reporting issues
Knowledge of internet related business metrics including SEM/SEO/CPC/CPA,LTV, etc.
2+ years of experience leading projects from start to finish working with product managers and development and cross-functional teams

OUR IDEAL CANDIDATE


Experience with SQL querying and stored procedures
Strong understanding of EXCEL, using functions and pivot tables
Experience with Tableau or other BI tool
Experience with A/B testing and some statistical acumen
